summary: After an all-night send-off party for the troops, a small-town girl wakes up to find herself married and pregnant, but with no memory of her husband's identity.
cast: Eddie Bracken|Betty Hutton|Diana Lynn|William Demarest|Porter Hall|Emory Parnell|Al Bridge|Julius Tannen|Victor Potel|Brian Donlevy|Akim Tamiroff|Fred Aldrich|Don Anderson|Hank Bell|Jane Buckingham|Georgia Caine|Bill Cartledge|Nora Cecil|Tom Coleman|Chester Conklin|Jimmy Conlin|Hal Craig|Roger Creed|Joe Devlin|Robert Dudley|Budd Fine|Byron Foulger|Rudy Germane|Kenneth Gibson|Herschel Graham|Eddie Hall|Louis Jean Heydt|George Hoagland|Esther Howard|Arthur Hoyt|J. Farrell MacDonald|George Melford|Torben Meyer|Frank Moran|Jack Norton|Spec O'Donnell|Keith Richards|Harry Rosenthal|Almira Sessions|Freddie Steele|Connie Tompkins|Max Wagner|Bobby Watson|Conrad Wiedell
title: El milagro de Morgan Creek
